mapper.insert: insert into mkt_strategy_conf (MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, INIT_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CHANNELS_ID, AREA_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktStrategyConfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{channelsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update mkt_strategy_conf set INIT_ID =#{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME = #{mktStrategyConfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNELS_ID = #{channelsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, INIT_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CHANNELS_ID, AREA_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, INIT_ID, MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, CHANNELS_ID, AREA_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf

select s.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID, s.INIT_ID, s.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_NAME, s.BEGIN_TIME, s.END_TIME, s.CHANNELS_ID, s.AREA_ID, s.CREATE_STAFF, s.CREATE_DATE, s.UPDATE_STAFF, s.UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf as s left join mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel as cs on s.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = cs.STRATEGY_CONF_ID where cs.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId}
